scripts.build:renderer: esbuild src/renderer/renderer.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/renderer/renderer.js --platform=browser --format=iife --external:electron && esbuild src/renderer/live2d.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/renderer/live2d.js --platform=browser --format=iife && esbuild src/renderer/mascot.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/renderer/mascot.js --platform=browser --format=iife
scripts.copy-assets: mkdir -p dist/renderer && cp src/renderer/*.html src/renderer/*.css dist/renderer/ && cp -r src/renderer/lib dist/renderer/ && cp -r src/renderer/assets dist/renderer/
scripts.build: npm run build:main && npm run build:preload && npm run build:renderer && npm run copy-assets
scripts.start: unset ELECTRON_RUN_AS_NODE && npm run build && electron .
scripts.dev: unset ELECTRON_RUN_AS_NODE && npm run build && electron .
